commands: Before we continue, you should probably change your settings.|Press 'x' on an empty space without any type of unit.|Open up the 'options' menu and change what you prefer.|We recommend changing your resolution, disabling mouse controls, and increasing the speed of the text.|To continue the tutorial, press 'end' after clicking on an empty space to end your player phase OR move your character.|Did you already forget how to open options?|Try pressing 'c' during a textbox to open up the history.
